text.onarail.link.cant_link_as_parent: This minecart isn't part of a train!
text.onarail.link.cant_link_as_child: This minecart can't be part of a train!
text.onarail.link.already_linked_as_pare: This minecart already has another minecart coupled to it!
text.onarail.link.already_linked_as_chil: This minecart is already coupled to another minecart!
text.onarail.link.cant_link_too_far: These minecarts are too far apart!
